name: CSM Bakery Solutions
description: CSM Bakery Solutions is a leading global provider of bakery products and solutions, committed to delivering quality and innovation to its customers. Established in 2015 through the merger of several well-known brands, CSM leverages a rich heritage in the baking industry with a focus on sustainability and customer-centric solutions. The company offers a comprehensive range of products including frozen dough, bakery mixes, and toppings that cater to various market segments such as retail, foodservice, and industrial clients. CSM Bakery Solutions emphasizes collaboration with its customers to develop tailored solutions that meet their unique needs, driving growth in the competitive bakery sector. With a commitment to quality, CSM maintains rigorous standards in their production processes and ingredient sourcing, ensuring that their products not only taste great but also meet the highest safety and nutritional standards. The company is also dedicated to sustainability, implementing initiatives to reduce waste and energy consumption across its operations. By combining traditional baking expertise with modern technology, CSM Bakery Solutions strives to be the preferred partner for bakers worldwide, providing innovative products that enhance the baking experience.
